summmary: This is the line chart which describes the relationship between the x axis of research_and_development_expenditure and the y axis of year. From the year values of 1990 to 2014, there is an increasing trend. We find the maximum value for research_and_development_expenditure of 8526.5 in year at 2014. We find the minimum value for research_and_development_expenditure of 571.7 in year at 1990. This line chart has a strongly positive correlation.
